title: Beginner Dance Education Course Applying WSQ-Based Flipped Learning

context.prior_knowledge: No understanding of basic dance movements
context.additional_context: A non-degree foundational dance education program targeting job seekers and hobby learners.

learning_goals: After 12 weeks of instruction, learners can perform five basic dance skills (rhythm, footwork, upper-body movement, transitional movements, expressiveness) with 80% accuracy through WSQ activities (Watch-Summary-Question).
Learners enhance self-directed learning skills by submitting a 300-character summary of key movements and three learning questions after watching weekly video materials.
Achieve over 90% participation rate in real-time classes and a 70%+ correction rate of movements incorporating peer feedback.

resources: Dance Basics Video Materials (12 Weekly 5-Minute Segments)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
